mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members(mid, mpw, mname, maddr, mbirth, mphone, memail) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{maddr2}, #{user_birthday}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members WHERE mid=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members WHERE memail=#{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members WHERE mphone=#{user_phone}
